welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Medway, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets and immerse yourselves in all that Medway has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as the main hub for major airlines, with domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Primarily used by low-cost carriers for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Dedicated to all international arrivals and departures.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
